name: Fly Now: Tap Tap Penguin Game
name_original: Fly Now: Tap Tap Penguin Game
description:
Ever wonder how a penguin fly? It is so CUTE!!

Tap to make your penguin flap and fly! Save those lil penguins along your way! Also, be careful and avoid those swinging penguins coming at you.

Simple, fun, casual yet challenging!!

Easy to play! Bring your penguins to the outer space!

★ SO MANY PENGUINS!!
★ BRAND NEW play style!
★ Simple & cute graphics
★ Beautiful scenery all the way up
★ Funny actions
★ Simple gameplay! Just tap!
★ More than 10 different patterns of blocks to avoid - THINK and act quick!
★ Unlock more than 10 different cute penguins
★ Challenge your focus and brain
★ Simply addicting
★ Save those lil penguins as much as you can
★ Fly all the way to the outer space
★ Compete for the best score in the world!

Download now and FLY NOW!!
